name: VATSALYA
briefDescription: Vatsalya started working towards networking & capacity building of grass root functionaries, developing need based literature in easy to understand language, strengthening the ongoing attempts by providing consultancy services marching towards a harmonious healthy society by advocating for the social health issues. Organization pay specific emphasis on community process and participation in all its programmatic interventions. Liaising ordination and linkages with media and other stakeholders specifically government is also in the nucleus of programmatic activities.  We reached around 168394 beneficiaries i.e. Adolescents, children, women, Men, & youth by both direct & indirect means.
